title: Gold Jungler/Top Laner Looking for a team
body:
Hey folks, as the title says I am a Gold jg/top and i'm looking for a team of guys to play and rank up with, and perhaps compete in things like the OPL Open Ladder later down the track.
I have a reasonable champion pool, and I have a good understanding of the game.
HMU if you would like to talk about anything, or even play some games :)

IGN: Brindyyy

replies.body: Added you hope to hear from you soon :)
